item.title: Weekly Review #65 - Adventure X Experience, Apple Notes Practice, and EpubKit
item.description: 'Photograph - Ed Sheeran' Preface This piece records and reflects on my life from July 10 to July 21, 2024. This week and a half has been quite eventful. Work has been somewhat busy. I participated in the Adventure X event, which was a lot of fun. I experimented with the Remix framework and prepared for a workshop. I met with Randy, and together we planned the redesign and subsequent development of EpubKit, essentially holding our own hackathon for us “middle-aged hippies” who couldn’t participate in the competition.
